committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To provide for annual observances of certain legal public holidays on their traditional dates.

summary.text: Redesignates the legal public holidays of the Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr., as January 15, Washington's Birthday as February 22, Memorial Day as May 30, and Columbus Day as October 12.

titles.title: To provide for annual observances of certain legal public holidays on their traditional dates.
